title: Eternal
description: In the anticipated sequel, Shea Aclies ventures off to Kent University with her boyfriend Cameron Price. She has accepted that her relationship with Gabriel Tucker was a failure and vows to move on. That evaporates when her ex-boyfriend/fiance, Gabriel Tucker, walks into her Chemistry class after vanishing three months prior. Things get hot and heavy when Shea realizes she's not over the Heat Bidder, and she finds herself in a love triangle. Torn between the man who stole her heart, and the man who pieced it back together, Shea sets off on the road to self-discovery. But what she didn't expect was to find on that journey was Emoryse, Blakely Price.
author: A.J. Johnson-Clark
